targets.expr:

(sum(count(cadence_sticky_cache_hit{namespace="$namespace",domain="$domain"})) by (Domain, TaskList)+
sum(count(cadence_sticky_cache_miss{namespace="$namespace",domain="$domain"})) by (Domain, TaskList))*100
